Name: Wright
Description:
The Division of Wright consists of:

  • Lockyer Valley Regional Council,
  • part of the Gold Coast City Council,
  • part of the Ipswich City Council,
  • part of the Logan City Council,
  • part of the Scenic Rim Regional Council, and
  • part of the Southern Downs Regional Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Boutique tourism and a wide range of primary production activities.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of Judith Wright, 1915-2000, in recognition of her service and contributions to Australia as a poet, author and social and environmental activist. Ms Wright was founding president of the Wildlife Preservation Society of Queensland and a founding member of the Aboriginal Treaty Committee.
DemographicRating: Rural - outside capital cities and without majority of enrolment in major provincial cities
